path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - FlowX Swap - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Mistake in description of some functions
findings.description: In Router module, swap and mint function descriptions are based on Uniswap V2 knowledge in EVM environment which may lead to user misconceptions.

findings.title: Incorrect Numeric Comparison
findings.description: The compare logic in the comparator module does not yield accurate results when the input type is numeric.
